Articles.Content:
Hi guys!

I'm a pretty new KSP player, what starting to play in .90 and all. Although I probably don't know much compared to others, I feel like I have learned a lot from the amount of time I've played the game. From the first rocket that went into flames to landing probes on Duna, there was nothing but progress. I mostly built planes and missions to the Mun, though.

Anyway, besides KSP, I like to stargaze and read novels, as well as make wonderful origami for my friends and family. I also play the piano and the marimba in my spare time. Much of my day is dedicated to what I call "Planned wastes of time," so I always have something to do, even though it looks like I don't.

Well, there is a little bit of what I like to do, and with that, I say a bright "Hello!" to all of the people on this forum! ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)
Hi! I can't wait to see your planes in the Spacecraft Exchange!

Welcome Friend!

> 
> marimba in my spare time.

Marimba's makes Great Space Music!
